text: dunya mein apne ko bada samajhne ki wajeh se aur un ki buri tadhbiro ki wajeh aur buri tadhbiro ka wabaal un tadhbeer waalo hee par padta hai, so kya ye isi dastoor ke muntazir hai jo agle logo ke saath hota raha hai, so aap Allah ke dastoor ko kabhi badalta hoa na payenge aur aap Allah ke dastoor ko kabhi muntaqil hota hoa na payenge
